text: Hermanos Serdán International Airport or Puebla International Airport, is an airport in Huejotzingo Municipality, Mexico. It opened in 1982. ==Airlines== These are the airlines that go to Puebla Airport: *Aeroméxico *American Airlines *Copa Airlines *Delta Air Lines *Delta Connection *Interjet *Magnicharters *United Airlines *United Express *VivaAerobus *Volaris ==References== Category:Puebla City Category:Airports in Mexico Category:Puebla (state) Category:Buildings and structures in Mexico
title: Hermanos Serdán International Airport
